005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public final class ArraySubarray {
027  @NonNull
028  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
029      .name("subarray")
030      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
031      .deterministic()
032      .contextIndependent()
033      .focusIndependent()
034      .argument(IArgument.builder()
035          .name("array")
036          .type(IArrayItem.class)
037          .one()
038          .build())
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("start")
041          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
042          .one()
043          .build())
044      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
045      .returnOne()
046      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeTwoArg)
047      .build();
048  @NonNull
049  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
050      .name("subarray")
051      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
052      .deterministic()
053      .contextIndependent()
054      .focusIndependent()
055      .argument(IArgument.builder()
056          .name("array")
057          .type(IArrayItem.class)
058          .one()
059          .build())
060      .argument(IArgument.builder()
061          .name("start")
062          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
063          .one()
064          .build())
065      .argument(IArgument.builder()
066          .name("length")
067          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
068          .one()
069          .build())
070      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
071      .returnOne()
072      .functionHandler(ArraySubarray::executeThreeArg)
073      .build();
074
075  private ArraySubarray() {
076    // disable construction
077  }
078
079  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
080  @NonNull
081  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeTwoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
082      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
083      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
084      IItem focus) {
085    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
086        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
087    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
088
089    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start));
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
093  @NonNull
094  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> executeThreeArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
095      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
096      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
097      IItem focus) {
098    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
099        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
100    IIntegerItem start = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
101    IIntegerItem length = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
102
103    return ISequence.of(subarray(array, start, length));
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
108   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
109   *
110   * @param <T>
111   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
112   * @param array
113   *          the target Metapath array
114   * @param startItem
115   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
116   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
117   * @throws ArrayException
118   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
119   */
120  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
121  @NonNull
122  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
123      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
124      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem) {
125    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
130   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
131   *
132   * @param <T>
133   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
134   * @param array
135   *          the target Metapath array
136   * @param startItem
137   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
138   * @param lengthItem
139   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
140   *          start position
141   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
142   * @throws ArrayException
143   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
144   *           to array:size
145   */
146  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.OnlyOneReturn")
147  @NonNull
148  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
149      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
150      @NonNull IIntegerItem startItem,
151      @NonNull IIntegerItem lengthItem) {
152    return subarray(array, startItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), lengthItem.asInteger().intValueExact());
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
157   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
158   *
159   * @param <T>
160   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
161   * @param array
162   *          the target Metapath array
163   * @param start
164   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
165   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
166   * @throws ArrayException
167   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
168   *           to array:size
169   */
170  @NonNull
171  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
172      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
173      int start) {
174    return subarray(array, start, array.size() - start + 1);
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
179   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-subarray">array:subarray</a>.
180   *
181   * @param <T>
182   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
183   * @param array
184   *          the target Metapath array
185   * @param start
186   *          the integer position of the item to start with (inclusive)
187   * @param length
188   *          the integer count of items to include starting with the item at the
189   *          start position
190   * @return a new array item consisting of the items in the identified range
191   * @throws ArrayException
192   *           if the length is negative or the position is not in the range of 1
193   *           to array:size
194   */
195  @NonNull
196  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> subarray(
197      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
198      int start,
199      int length) {
200    if (length < 0) {
201      throw new ArrayException(
202          ArrayException.NEGATIVE_ARRAY_LENGTH, String.format("The length '%d' is negative.", length));
203    }
204
205    List<T> copy;
206    try {
207      copy = array.subList(start - 1, start - 1 + length);
208    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
209      throw new ArrayException(
210          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
211          String.format("The start + length (%d + %d) exceeds the array length '%d'.",
212              start,
213              length,
214              array.size()),
215          ex);
216    }
217
218    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(new ArrayList<>(copy));
219  }
220}
